Class InGameViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.ViewController

  • public class InGameViewController
extends ViewController

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void backToSettingBetAction()
      OKBetButton-action
      void checkBalance()
      If player runs out of money, the game will give them an option to get money back Opens up a message with "Yes" and "No" actions
      void checkForDouble()
      Checks if doubling is possible and if its possible, it enables 'Double' button
      void checkForEvenMoney()
      Checks if it's possible for the player to choose even money-option and enables to press even money-button

      Checks if insuring is possible and if its possible, it enables 'Insurance' button

      Checks if splitting is possible and if its possible, it enables 'Split' button

      Checks for all the special rules
      void clearTable()
      Clears the table to end the round
      void closeButton()
      Instruction screen's Close-Button closes the instructions
      void deal()
      Deal-button sets bet, updates player's currency, Sets round to start, enables hit and stand buttons, shows first cards in UI and updates the total counter
      void declareWinner​(java.lang.String winner)
      Declares winner of the round and enables winnerScreen, where winner is displayed in UI Switch case defines which String is set to the UI Updates player's currency Clears the table

      Disables the 'Hit' button if Blackjack has been gained immediately from the first two cards

      Method to disable all the special rule buttons at once

        public void declareWinner​(java.lang.String winner)

        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - sleep

        public void doublePressed()
        Does the changes needed if the player decides to double. Disables the buttons that should not be used after doubling and tells the controller the player wants to double Updates the player's balance
